title: Dangerous new infostealer targets top password managers
description: 19 password managers and several  crypto wallets are being attacked by thieving malware.

title: Microsoft workers protest 'landmark year' CEO memo following pay freeze
description: Despite increasing revenues for at least the first three quarters of FY23, Microsoft is refusing to give employees a pay rise.

title: Man vs machine: a secure email firm aim to bring post-quantum cryptography to the cloud
description: Tutanota receive $1.5 million in funding to make cloud security quantum computing proof. Here's all you need to know.

title: Amazon has a big problem as AI-generated books flood Kindle Unlimited
description: While AI generators speed ahead, copyright, fact-checking and authenticity have been left up in the air. In books, as well as other media, questions are now being asked.

title: Thousands of Fortinet firewalls are unpatched against this serious security bug, so patch now
description: A patch was released a month ago, but many Fortinet users haven't applied it yet.

title: Cowboy's new Dutch-style Cruiser e-bike will make you feel like you're cycling through Amsterdam
description: Cowboy unveils the Cruiser, a Dutch-style electric bike that looks more comfy than ever.

title: US looks to cut China cloud access to AWS, Azure and more
description: US cloud companies may soon have to get government approval to sell to Chinese customers.

title: Netflix is planning two new Narnia movies from Barbie's director and I can't wait
description: Barbie director Greta Gerwig is filming a very different dream house for her next two movies.

title: New 13-inch MacBook Airs have quietly been upgraded with one of the 15-inch model’s most useful features
description: Apple quietly adds improved wireless connectivity to new 13-inch MacBook Airs.

title: Netflix could soon release new targeted ads that are like mini TV shows
description: Fed up seeing the same old ads? Netflix is working on a smart solution that could make ads worth watching

title: It looks like Twitter still isn't paying its office bills
description: Twitter hasn’t paid office renovation bills in the UK, ROI, Singapore, and Australia, and now it faces even bigger bills.

title: Xiaomi's iPhone 15 rival could come with Qualcomm's most powerful chip
description: Xiaomi looks like it’ll continue its strategy of incorporating Qualcomm's latest and greatest silicon, according to a new report.

title: Google Workspace adds AI image generation to your slides
description: Generative AI image generation is coming to Google Slides, and some users are trying it out early.

title: Threads: everything you need to know about Meta's Twitter rival
description: Meta's new Twitter alternative, Threads, finally has a release date – so we're breaking down everything you need to know.

title: One of the best Spotify features on phones is finally coming to desktop PCs
description: It has taken three years for this to appear on desktop as well as mobile, but hopefully, the long wait is nearly over.

title: Apple increases trade-in value for several iPhones ahead of iPhone 15 launch
description: Apple has increased the trade-in values for select older iPhones, ahead of the highly anticipated iPhone 15 launch, likely in September.

title: TweetDeck will soon be for paying subscribers only
description: TweetDeck will soon live behind a paywall, as Twitter makes another baffling change.

title: The trailer for Max's new thriller from Steven Soderbergh is a twisted web of lies
description: The full trailer for Full Circle is here, and it's full of mysteries – and we're full of excitement.

title: This 16-inch laptop with a hot-swappable graphics card could be the best gaming laptop I’ve ever seen
description: Framework has revealed new details about its upcoming 16-inch laptop, which features an amazing level of customization.

title: Nothing Phone 2 shows off its powered-up Glyph system in first hands-on video
description: The Nothing Phone 2 has been shown off on video, along with an explanation of its new Glyph features.

title: Some of your favorite music is coming to Canva
description: Canva partners with Warner Music Group and Merlin to let users add commercially released music to content creations.

title: The iPhone 15 will reportedly bring back a fan favorite iPhone 12 color
description: New leaks suggest that the iPhone 15 will be available in a mint-like green color.

title: Microsoft is still hard at work improving this unloved Windows 11 feature
description: How’s snap suggestions coming along in Windows 11? It’s looking pretty slick right now.

title: Microsoft denies massive user data breach - here's all we know so far
description: A hacking collective claims to have stolen 30 million Microsoft accounts, emails, and passwords - but is it legit?

title: Square Enix has officially cancelled the forever-delayed Just Cause: Mobile
description: Just Cause: Mobile has been cancelled after a couple of years in development and an underwhelming regional early access.

title: Insecure leads HBO TV show migration to Netflix, and many more will follow suit
description: You can now watch one of the best HBO TV shows on Netflix – and more are coming soon.

title: Leaked Google Pixel 8 Pro hands-on photos show off the design and even some specs
description: Photos of what appears to be a real life Google Pixel 8 Pro have leaked, revealing a lot about the phone.

title: Friday the 13th devs are giving players legendary perks as 'a heartfelt thank you'
description: Gun Media is giving players one last gift before its licence for Friday the 13th: The Game expires at the end of this year.

title: Diablo 4 devs to unveil plans for new season 1 content this week
description: Blizzard will finally be revealing its plans for the first of Diablo 4's seasons. Here's what we know so far and where to find the reveal.

title: Nokia and Apple sign long-term 5G license deal
description: Apple-Nokia deal, details of which remain confidential, replaces the one due to expire this year.

title: Super Mario RPG director "surprised and pleased" with remake but isn't involved
description: The original director of Super Mario RPG, Chihiro Fujioka, has expressed his opinion on the upcoming remake of the game.

title: Google wants to make its Chat app a lot more personal by copying WhatsApp
description: In an attempt to renew Chat, Google is adding some long overdue features like messaging editing and read receipts.

title: Quordle today - hints and answers for Tuesday, July 4 (game #526)
description: Looking for Quordle clues? We can help. Plus get the answers to Quordle today and past solutions.
